blogs.title: Engaging responsibly with social media: the BJUI Guidelines
blogs.summary:
The final, peer-reviewed version of this paper has been accepted for publication in BJUI. You can find it here. Please cite this article as doi: 10.1111/bju.12788 
The social media revolution is well underway. Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagra

author.name: BJUI
author.description: BJU International
